scenario.name: register_client
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[remote_ip] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0]@[field1]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[field0]@[field1]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] REGISTER Contact: sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 10 Expires: 120 User-Agent: ItLong Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[field2]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0]@[field1]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[field2]@[field1]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Content-Type: application/sdp Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, OPTIONS, BYE, REFER, NOTIFY, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, INFO Max-Forwards: 70 User-Agent: ItLong Subject: Phone call Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:124 opus/48000 a=fmtp:124 useinbandfec=1; usedtx=1 a=rtpmap:111 speex/16000 a=fmtp:111 vbr=on a=rtpmap:110 speex/8000 a=fmtp:110 vbr=on a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-11

ACK sip:[field2]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0]@[field1]>;tag=[call_number] [last_To:] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Contact: sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:[field2]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0]@[field1]>;tag=[call_number] [last_To:] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Contact: sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
